ModMetaData.name: Less Beer Addiction
ModMetaData.author: Squirting Elephant
ModMetaData.description:
Lowers the chance of an alcohol addiction from drinking beer by raising the minimum tolerance required from 25% --> 55%.
- Performance impact: None. - Avg load time: 0ms. - Mod is XPath only. - Can safely be added to an existing game. - Can safely be removed from an existing game.
If you are tired of animals eating and drinking your drugs then also consider this mod (not mine): https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1531640632
